title: Four Weddings and a Funeral (1994) Hugh Grant (Opt.MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109831/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109831/</a>

With Andie MacDowell (Bad Girls), Simon Callow, John Hannah

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files:
Croatian (Hrvatski), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Spanish, Slovenian, Swedish.
(Tip: Click the blue Number of files at upper left and check the contents of this package to confirm that your language is included.)

This gem of a classic comedy should be seen at least once a year. I made a new rip with widescreen and optional multisubs for those of you who would join me.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith. 

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 720x368, really great stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
